name: Key of time (itch)
description:
This is a game about multitasking sorry it's bad I promise I will  make updates.

This game was made with the help of https://itch.io/profile/maly-ale, great friend, good game developer.(still learning tho)

And with the help of https://itch.io/profile/marius129, great guy, He knows how to draw ngl  :)) (we need to work more on scripts my dud); 

It was an fun experience and I will do it again.
